entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore is mentioned as a being present at King's Cross. He is described as having a conversation with Harry.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as the one who had his blood taken by Voldemort and rebuilt into a Horcrux.

entities.name: voldemort
entities.description: Voldemort is mentioned as the one who took Harry's blood and created a Horcrux.

entities.name: lily
entities.description: Lily is mentioned as the mother of Harry and the one whose protection is inside both Harry and Voldemort.

entities.name: kingâ€™s cross
entities.description: King's Cross is mentioned as a location where Dumbledore and Harry are present.

entities.name: the creature
entities.description: The creature is mentioned as an agonized being that is behind Dumbledore and Harry.

relationships.description: Voldemort created a Horcrux from Harry's blood.
Lily's protection is inside both Harry and Voldemort.
Voldemort was tethered to life by Dumbledore's living body.
